channel.title: Software Engineering on Anna-Lena Popkes
channel.description: Recent content in Software Engineering on Anna-Lena Popkes

item.title: An introduction to Docker
item.description: Topics: Docker I have been wanting to learn more about Docker for months. However, when starting to read Dockers get started page I quickly had to find out that I’m lacking knowledge in too many other concepts. Since my background isn’t computer science I often run across this problem. Luckily, this allows me to constantly learn new things! After writing a post on virtual machines and another about containers this one is finally about Docker!

item.title: An introduction to containers
item.description: Topics: Containers I have been wanting to learn more about Docker for months. However, when starting to read Dockers get started page I quickly had to find out that I’m lacking knowledge in too many other concepts. Since my background isn’t computer science I often run across this problem. Luckily, this allows me to constantly learn new things! With the goal of eventually reaching the topic of Docker, the first post introduced virtual machines.

item.title: An introduction to virtual machines
item.description: Topics: Virtual machines I have been wanting to learn more about Docker for months. However, when starting to read Dockers get started page I quickly had to find out that I’m lacking knowledge in too many other concepts. Since my background isn’t computer science I often run across this problem. Luckily, this allows me to constantly learn new things! With the goal of eventually reaching the topic of Docker, this post will introduce virtual machines, while the next one will be about containers.
